Nerangs.ab: amā ēn ǰuddēwdād pad xšnūman ī srōš nibišt ēstēd čīyōn xšnūman srōš bēd ka āfrīnāmi bē guft hēnd sraōšahe nē abāyēd guftan čīyōn xšnūman dudīgar bēd sraōšahe aṣ̌iiehe taxmahe tanumąϑrahe darši.draōš āhūiriiehe bē abāyēd guftan

"We have written this J̌uddēwdād with the šnūman for Sroš. When it is the šnūman for Srōš, when they have said āfrīnāmi, they do not have to recite sraōšahe. When it is a different šnūman, then they must recite sraōšahe aṣ̌iiehe taxmahe tanumąϑrahe darši.draōš āhūiriiehe."
